welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oudewater, a charming Dutch city known for its picturesque canals and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy our beautiful city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for budget airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and busiest terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving mainly European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a wide variety of shops and restaurants, serving mainly intercontinental flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and most technologically advanced terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving mainly low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 4 hours throughout the airport.
